Title: Henry V
Overview: Gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.
Tagline: The great adventure of a king who defied the odds to prove himself a man.
production_companies: BBC Films, Samuel Goldwyn Company, Renaissance Films
Cast: Kenneth Branagh, Derek Jacobi, Brian Blessed
clean_text: henry v gritty adaption william shakespeares play english king bloody conquest france great adventure king defy odd prove man war drama history kenneth branagh kenneth branagh derek jacobi brian bless 1989
